title: A RESOLUTION STRONGLY ENJOINING LAGUNA AQUATECH (FORMERLY ”LARC”) TO TEMPORARILY SUSPEND THE IMPOSITION OF THE TEN PERCENT (1096) PENALTY, THE CONDUCT OF DISCONNECTION ACTIVITIES, AND THE COLLECTION OF RECONNECTION CHARGES ON AFFECTED HOUSEHOLDS IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF LOS BANOS, IN VIEW OF THE PERSISTENT ISSUES OF LOW WATER PRESSURE AND WATER DISCOLORATION IN THE AREA.
